name: web3-bank
description: A web3 app that implements account creation and asset transfer

scripts.build: npm run lint && npx hardhat compile
scripts.test: npm run build && REPORT_GAS=true npx hardhat test
scripts.deploy:Bank: npm run test && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/Bank.ts --network sepolia --verify
scripts.deploy:iDrisToken: npm run test && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/iDrisToken.ts --network lisk-sepolia --verify
scripts.deploy:StakeIDrisToken: npm run test && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/StakeIDrisToken.ts --network lisk-sepolia --verify

author: Idris Akintobi
